item.title: Lvl Tut plz
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Search this in client.java

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

under it paste this over whats there

[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 200;
}[/code]
